package.name: rustc
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} jobcount=4 export CC='/usr/local/gcc54/bin/gcc54' export CXX='/usr/local/gcc54/bin/g++54' if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC='distcc /usr/local/gcc54/bin/gcc54' export CXX='distcc /usr/local/gcc54/bin/g++54' fi ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var make -j $jobcount make -j $jobcount all
